[dir='rtl'] {
  text-align: right;
  direction: rtl; }

[dir='rtl'] ul,
[dir='rtl'] ol {
  margin-right: 2rem;
  margin-left: 0;
  padding-right: 2rem;
  padding-left: 0; }

[dir='rtl'] ul &gt; li:before {
  margin-right: 0;
  margin-left: 1.25rem; }

[dir='rtl'] ol &gt; li:before {
  margin-right: 0;
  margin-left: 1rem; }

[dir='rtl'] .uscb-cta-button:after,
[dir='rtl'] .uscb-text-img-button:after {
  -webkit-transform: scaleX(-1);
      -ms-transform: scaleX(-1);
          transform: scaleX(-1); }

[dir='rtl'] .uscb-cta-button:hover:after, [dir='rtl'] .uscb-cta-button:focus:after,
[dir='rtl'] .uscb-text-img-button:hover:after,
[dir='rtl'] .uscb-text-img-button:focus:after {
  -webkit-transform: scaleX(-1) translateX(5px);
      -ms-transform: scaleX(-1) translateX(5px);
          transform: scaleX(-1) translateX(5px); }

[dir='rtl'] .uscb-cta-button--inline-arrow svg {
  -webkit-transform: scaleX(-1);
      -ms-transform: scaleX(-1);
          transform: scaleX(-1); }

[dir='rtl'] .uscb-button-arrow .uscb-button:before,
[dir='rtl'] .uscb-button-arrow .uscb-primary-button:before,
[dir='rtl'] .uscb-button-arrow .uscb-secondary-button:before,
[dir='rtl'] .uscb-button-arrow .uscb-button-green:before,
[dir='rtl'] .uscb-button-arrow .uscb-white-button:before,
[dir='rtl'] .uscb-button-arrow .uscb-button-white:before {
  float: left;
  margin-right: 5px;
  margin-left: -10px;
  -webkit-transform: scaleX(-1);
      -ms-transform: scaleX(-1);
          transform: scaleX(-1);
  -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.5s;
  transition: -webkit-transform 0.5s;
  -o-transition: transform 0.5s;
  transition: transform 0.5s;
  transition: transform 0.5s, -webkit-transform 0.5s; }

[dir='rtl'] .uscb-button-arrow .uscb-button:hover:before, [dir='rtl'] .uscb-button-arrow .uscb-button:focus:before,
[dir='rtl'] .uscb-button-arrow .uscb-primary-button:hover:before,
[dir='rtl'] .uscb-button-arrow .uscb-primary-button:focus:before,

[dir='rtl'] .uscb-button-arrow .uscb-secondary-button:focus:before,

[dir='rtl'] .uscb-button-arrow .uscb-button-green:focus:before,
[dir='rtl'] .uscb-button-arrow .uscb-white-button:hover:before,
[dir='rtl'] .uscb-button-arrow .uscb-white-button:focus:before,
[dir='rtl'] .uscb-button-arrow .uscb-button-white:hover:before,
[dir='rtl'] .uscb-button-arrow .uscb-button-white:focus:before {
  -webkit-transform: scaleX(-1) translateX(5px);
      -ms-transform: scaleX(-1) translateX(5px);
          transform: scaleX(-1) translateX(5px); }

  margin-right: 5px;
  margin-left: -5px; }

  -webkit-transform: rotate(180deg);
      -ms-transform: rotate(180deg);
          transform: rotate(180deg); }

[dir='rtl'] .cmp-carousel__action--next {
  margin-right: 0;
  margin-left: 0; }

[dir='rtl'] .uscb-dropdown-toggle {
  padding-right: 0;
  padding-left: 16px; }
  [dir='rtl'] .uscb-dropdown-toggle:after {
    right: auto;
    left: 0; }
  [dir='rtl'] .uscb-dropdown-toggle i {
    margin-right: 0;
    margin-left: 12px; }

[dir='rtl'] .banneralert .data-uscb-banner-alert-container {
  padding-right: 20px;
  padding-left: 40px; }

[dir='rtl'] .banneralert .uscb-banner-alert-content {
  -webkit-box-align: start;
      -ms-flex-align: start;
          align-items: flex-start;
  padding-right: 20px;
  padding-left: 0;
  border-right: 3px solid #d54468;
  border-left: 0; }

[dir='rtl'] .banneralert .data-uscb-banner-dismiss-btn {
  right: auto;
  left: 0;
  padding-left: 20px;
  border: 0; }

[dir='rtl'] .uscb-text-media-media.uscb-float-right {
  float: left;
  margin-right: 16px;
  margin-left: 0; }

[dir='rtl'] .uscb-text-media-media.uscb-float-left {
  float: right;
  margin-right: 0;
  margin-left: 16px; }

  background-position: right center; }
